DOC.detailed_description: The investigator develop novel mean collect sexual health information adolescent emergency department ( ED ) use audio-computer assist self-interview ( ACASI ) . This information use provide clinical decision support clinician target sexually transmitted infection ( STI ) screen ED adolescent . This randomized trial randomize patient whether clinician receives decision support test whether provision decision support result increase STI screen patient report high risk sexual activity . Secondary outcome include evaluation whether clinical decision support result increase STI detection , identify factor associate adapt clinical decision support .
